authors.name: Samuel Montgomery
authors.affiliation: Telethon Kids Institute; University of Western Australia; Curtin University

before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"5gfm8","text":"This protocol extracts DNA from samples stored in 45μL of PBS - if the sample is in a larger volume, the volumes of all following reagents can be scaled up, ensuring consistent ratios throughout the protocol. Otherwise, centrifuge sample at high speed for ~5 minutes and remove supernatant, resuspending pellet in 45uL of PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c15av","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4pprv","text":"Assessing the microbiome in respiratory samples is often difficult due to the low biomass of microbes often present in these samples. While there are published methods for efficient extraction of DNA from samples such as bronchoalveolar lavage fluid for 16s rRNA sequencing or metagenomic sequencing (Saladie et al., 2020), these methodologies are usually optimised for traditional short-read based sequencing technologies. With the advent of accessible and affordable long-read sequencing technologies for full length 16s rRNA sequencing (PacBio) and whole metagenomic sequencing (Oxford Nanopore), there is increased importance in extracting high quality, high molecular weight fragments of DNA from metagenomic samples. This protocol can be used to extract DNA from both low biomass (nasal lining fluid, bronchoalveolar lavage, nasal swabs) and high biomass (pure bacterial culture) samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":309,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"ae3aj","text":"This protocol can be used to extract DNA from both low biomass (nasal lining fluid, BALf, nasal swab) and high biomass samples (bacterial culture)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"529rs","text":"The following materials were utilised for this protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93lmu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1d103","text":"Puregene tissue kit (Qiagen, #158023) containing cell lysis solution, protein precipitation buffer, proteinase K, RNase A, and DNA hydration buffer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71bng","text":"Ethanol, molecular grade (Sigma, #E7023)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hgrh","text":"MetaPolyzyme (Sigma, #MAC4L)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4elfg","text":"Phosphate buffered saline, sterile filtered (ThermoFisher, #10010023)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kogk","text":"30% polyethylene glycol (PEG) 8000 solution in 1.6 M NaCl pH 6.7 (Bioworld, #41620040-1)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"694i5","text":"UltraPure molecular grade water (ThermoFisher, #10977015)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gdqi","text":"GenElute linear polyacrylamide (Sigma, #56575)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db5r3","text":"0.1mm silica/zirconia beads (Biospec, #11079101z)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnjjn","text":"Isopropanol, molecular grade (Sigma, #I9516)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"deud8","text":"Saladié M, Caparrós-Martín JA, Agudelo-Romero P, Wark PAB, Stick SM, O'Gara F. Microbiomic Analysis on Low Abundant Respiratory Biomass Samples; Improved Recovery of Microbial DNA From Bronchoalveolar Lavage Fluid. Front Microbiol. 2020 Oct 6;11:572504. doi: 10.3389/fmicb.2020.572504. PMID: 33123104","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"akqam","text":"MetaPolyzyme is recieved as a lypholysed powder. Reconstitute following manufacturers instructions to a final concentration of  , aliquot into 0.6mL microtubes, and store at -20ºC until use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":127,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fg5ee","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmqe","text":"Create a   solution of molecular grade ethanol with UltraPure water (approx.   per sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":77,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4n0nv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"70","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vcre","text":"Add 5uL of MetaPolyzyme ( ) to   of sample in PBS in a 1.5mL microtube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cakl8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"45","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ck9kr","text":"Incubate for   at    using a Thermomixer at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ai0up","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5945a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qlv2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"35","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"500","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2986","text":"Add sample (~50uL) to the prepared 2.0mL screw cap microtube containing beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3csc5","text":"Add   of Cell Lysis Solution containing   Proteinase K and   RNase A solution to the sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"qgqf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.6","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.6","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gtsk","text":"Increase the temperature to    and incubate for   in a thermomixer at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2gckf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"56","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"500","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"m011","text":"Add   of protein precipitation solution containing   GenElute linear polyacrylamide to the sample and mix thoroughly by inverting the tube 25 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bjmll","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9cdvt","text":"Incubate samples on ice for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"25em4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6h524","text":"Add supernatant to a new 1.5mL LoBind tube, careful not to disturb the protein pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3kb1i","text":"For low biomass samples where expected DNA recovery is low","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72e1d","text":"For high biomass samples where expected DNA recovery is high","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"e2ep0","text":"While this protocol does not utilise common hazardous chemicals used for DNA extraction (phenol/chloroform), care should be taken to follow the recommendations in the MSDS provided which each reagent, and ensure proper storage for the dangerous goods utilised in this protocol (flammable liquids etc)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
